description:
You wake up in a dripping concrete chamber. A massive padlock bars the only exit, and a maze of lightless passages winds between you and the key. Navigate the claustrophobic dark before the dark water rises, and hope to make it out before you meet the guardian of the tunnels.

Pick up this awesome game here: http://survivethenightgames.com/

In this build we begin the deathtrap dungeon of Aqualung. Join me for a game layout that anyone can build.

STOCK UP FOR THIS CRAFT! (You help the channel with every purchase)

Craft Paint Set (Basic Colors): https://amzn.to/2OlJvfg

Craft Paint Set (Best Sellers): https://amzn.to/2OMtkJ3

Craft Paintbrush Set: https://amzn.to/2vpkLvM

Elmer's Glue-All Gallon: https://amzn.to/2ISM2w4
